name: french-press
description: Convert your original CoffeeScript grounds in place to expanded JavaScript code (automatically or via context menu).

preferences.name: auto_convert_coffee_files
preferences.description: Automatically convert all CoffeeScript files to JavaScript
preferences.title: Auto-convert .coffee files

preferences.name: remove_IIFEs
preferences.description: Remove CoffeeScript Immediately Invoked Function Expressions (anonymous function wrapping)
preferences.title: Remove CoffeeScript IIFE (anonymous function wrapping)

author: Brett Zamir
